summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Kenyon Street and West Kenyon Street, from 8th Avenue South to Detroit Avenue (County Road), and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by filling and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8734 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
